sentences.en: A deep - rooted tree is leafy ; an ambitious man is vigorous.
sentences.cn: 根深 叶才茂,志壮干劲高.

sentences.en: Can be slimming food: green leafy vegetables, meat, eggs, cheese, yogurt.
sentences.cn: 可减肥的食物: 绿叶蔬菜, 肉类 、 鸡蛋 、 奶酪 、 酸奶.

sentences.en: Chilean evergreen whose leafy boughs are used for thatching.
sentences.cn: 智利的一种常绿乔木,枝条有叶,用做盖屋顶的材料.

sentences.en: Each pendent twig and leafy festoon was in a blaze.
sentences.cn: 每根悬挂着的细枝和每一串树叶都在燃烧.

sentences.en: Eat plenty of leafy green vegetables.
He should eat plenty of fruits, leafy vegetables and coarse cereals.
sentences.cn: 他应当多吃水果, 带叶的蔬菜和粗粮.

sentences.en: Leafy branches arched over the road.
sentences.cn: 叶子繁茂的树枝在路的上方弯成了拱圆形.

sentences.en: leafy green vegetables such as spinach
The birds were twittering and trilling in the tall leafy boughs of oak and elm.
sentences.cn: 小鸟们在高大的橡树和榆树的绿叶垂垂的枝头上啾啾地叫着或颤声唱歌.

sentences.en: The trail wends its way through leafy woodland and sunny meadows.
sentences.cn: 这条小径穿过葱郁的林区和洒满阳光的草地.

sentences.en: They sat under the leafy bower at the end of the garden and watched the sun set.
sentences.cn: 他们坐在花园尽头由叶子搭成的凉棚下观看落日.

sentences.en: This conservatory enjoys an enviable position overlooking a leafy expanse.
sentences.cn: 这个温室位置绝佳，放眼望去，草木繁茂，郁郁葱葱。

sentences.en: This entire rickety structure was hanging from the limb of an enormous leafy tree.
sentences.cn: 这整个快要散架的搭建物吊挂在一棵枝繁叶茂的大树的枝杈上。

sentences.en: Timothy is exceptionally leafy and productive.
sentences.cn: 梯牧草特别多叶,且生长快.

words.tran_cn: 叶子；（书籍等的）一张；扇页
生叶，翻...的页（leaf的过去式和过去分词形式）
多叶的；叶状的；叶茂盛的

trans.tran_cn: 多叶的，叶茂的，多树木的
